title: Provincial nominees invited in surprise Express Entry draw
desc: Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) has issued more invitations to apply (ITA) through the Express Entry system. The immigration department issued 279 ITAs in a draw for Provincial Nominee Program (PNP) candidates. title: TCAA ordered to supervise the construction of the Civil Aviation Centre
desc: DAR ES SALAAM: THE Parliamentary Committee on Infrastructure has urged the Tanzania Civil Aviation Authority (TCAA) to closely supervise the contractor implementing the construction project for modern buildings at the Tanzania Civil Aviation Training Centre (CATC), to ensure the project is completed on time and meets the required standards. title: Nigerian PhD Researcher Launches BioSim Lab, a Virtual Biotechnology Platform Gaining Global Industry Recognition

title: Mineworkers union calls for urgent reforms in mining sector
desc: %%title%% %%sep%% %%primary_category%% %%sep%% %%sitename%% %%sep%% The Mineworkers Union of Namibia (MUN) has called for urgent reforms to transform labour practices and achieve decent work in the country’s mining sector.

title: Cocoa Crisis: Randy Abbey, top COCOBOD executives take salary cuts
desc: The Ghana Cocoa Board (COCOBOD) has announced salary cuts for its executive management and senior staff.

title: Nigeria: Oyo govt engages Botswana on AfCFTA implementation, explores trade partnerships

title: Malawi launches search for suspects in fake funeral charcoal smuggling
desc: Officials allege that an empty coffin was placed over concealed bags of charcoal in a hearse.
